snippet: Bahrain’s public prosecutor says authorities have charged 15 policemen with mistreating medics during last year’s crackdown on opposition protesters.
abstract: Bahrain authorities charge 15 policemen with mistreating medics during the 2011 crackdown on opposition protestors; charges follow an investigation into police abuses.
lead_paragraph: Bahrain’s public prosecutor says authorities have charged 15 policemen with mistreating medics during last year’s crackdown on opposition protesters.

headline.main: Bahrain: Policemen Charged With Mistreating Medical Staff
headline.print_headline: Bahrain: Policemen Charged With Mistreating Medical Staff
